website_summaries.verdict: This model is effortless to use, durable, water resistant, and it a great option for anyone wanting to record with terrific quality for short bursts, or at standard definition all day long.
pros: See up to 30 feet away in night vision mode
Includes car dock, 2 clothing clips, and USB charging cable
cons: While a 10-hour battery life sounds incredible, this body camera’s battery will only last that long while recording on a bland 480p resolution

customer_reviews.title: An experience so terrible, don't recomend it.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of grabage. I waste 119 on it and it wouldnt even turn on! Hit the reset button and it finnaly turned on BUT its infrared feature doesn't work(the setting was on for that,it was fully charged). so i turn the camera off to see if restarting will get the infrared to work but it won't turn back on. I have to hit the reset button which only works to turn it on 60% of the time.I also try to connect it to a computer. I tried different computer and the computers did not recognize the camera.This camera was an unacceptable waste of my time .I would NEVER recomend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Solorio Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm a private security officer. I use this every night at work. No problems so far. Pictures are clear, video is clear, even the infra red is good quality. The battery lasts all night... Granted, I turn it off when I'm not doing my foot patrols. Plenty of storage space. It's been rained on and nothing happened to it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Beaudry

customer_reviews.title: Bricked after two uses
customer_reviews.text: After two uses it needed a reset. No longer detected by my computers. The first use I was able to download the videos onto my computer. The second use my computer did not detect it, and after toggling the camera on and off trying to have it be detected the camera stopped responding to any button presses.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kenneth Perlstein

customer_reviews.title: 3rd bodycam for me but this is the one I am keeping!
customer_reviews.text: 3rd bodycam for me, so far it's been pretty good. I called CS and a real person answered right away sending me RMA info. Battery went dead but CS returned it to me in record time with additional cords including one for the car that was not available when I purchased it. The few days I was without it I really missed it. Also superior as a dash cam, I clip it to the visor and put it on automobile mode. Continous recording unlike my previous dash cams which made small clips only. Great camera and excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Zena Zeres

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Clear video and audio.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for work purposes. Video quality is good, even at night with the IR on. Audio is decent. Battery lasts me for several shifts. However, I do not have it on continously. I only turn it on when I am out of my car. I have not dropped it yet, or had it in heavy rain, so I cant comment as to how it holds up. Video transfer is easy. It just plugs into the computer via the charging cable and uses windows media player to watch what you captured. My only real complaint is navigating through the menus takes some getting used to. Once you get used to it though, it becomes easier. Overall, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It's used
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this camera. it was used ,looks dirty . the camera couldn't work for 4 hours with full charged ,and my PC cann't connected the camera for 1/3 chance.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I love it! The Picture video quality is FI#KING AWSOME
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The Picture video quality is FI#KING AWSOME!!! I also like how it comes with a white light that blinks and inferred light as well. In terms of using it as a dash cam, well the base will either need double sided tape or Velcro double sided or it will slide over. I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This bodycam works great! There is a bit of a learning curve, but once you figure it out it's easy to use. The night vision works really well. The microphone is crisp and clear. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing experience was simple and to the point. So far I have used this camera for about a month in a half. Video recording is good, I am amazed on how good the cameras ability to capture video at night. I have used it on the rain without any problems. Will update review if any issues arise, so far it has been a great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works great. Long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Once you get used to how it works, and figure out the functions, it works great. Long battery life, clear video and pretty good audio. The only complaints I have, and why I only gave 4 stars and not 5, is that the included instructions are hard to understand and poorly translated, and the outside lense cover is soft plastic and VERY easy to scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Dobie Tanpaw

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Had an earlier version I bought this year, looked different but worked perfectly. I loved it. Left it in a taxi in Cozumel so when I returned I was going to buy another. They redesigned it, and the reviews are not that good on it. Still going to buy one, just hope I get one as good as the last one.........Well just received the second one, charged it, and it works perfectly......2 for 2.....sounds good to me.......
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Bain

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my son - he hasn't commented either way
customer_reviews.text: I'm thinking my son was not all that impressed, or he would have commented more. It looks ver sturdy and received great ratings. It's awkward to ask how someone likes the "present" that you gave them. So I haven't pushed the issue.
customer_reviews.author: ACEY

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: For the price this body cam cannot be beat, it offers excellent quality premium quality at a affordable price ,only downside may be the lack to be able to expand with sd card but the built-in 32gb is more than enough, night and day quality both are very clear and the audio is loud and clear as well, no issues at all
customer_reviews.author: reggie

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 4 months with lite use.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it 4 months died on me today didn't use it that much wasn't hard on it at all. Don't buy its not worth how much you paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Security dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just needs better battery life. See review.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera lots of features! I just wished the battery life was alittle longer. On average it does about 5 hours. Now keeping in mind my climate can be hot or cold in Canada so there maybe times it lasts longer. It would have gotten a 5 star if it lasted 8-12 hours off the hop. As most shifts are atleast 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Got several other Police Officers trying to get your brand! 👮🏽🚔⚫️🔵⚫️
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Great cam, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. The IRs works great too. Fantastic body cam. It is a little heavy but it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it has really good quality, from the review some say the audio ...
customer_reviews.text: it has really good quality, from the review some say the audio has some hard to hear issue but from my experience the audio plays back just fine i can hear the conversations clearly. I Use it as a body cam and works really great!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Picture image is fantastic and the quick push button to record makes it ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture image is fantastic and the quick push button to record makes it great to let it be turned off when not needing to record, but when you push the button it goes on instantly and records perfect sound and vid :)
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these cameras for work. We were purchasing a different brand, but amazon is out of stock now. The camera is easy to use, durable, and takes great video. The only complaint my employees have is they are bulky and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: PrivateEye

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I use this for security patrol work. Having it has actually de-escalated some incidents, so it's been worth it. The only two problems, I dropped it from a height of about 2 ft and it shattered the onboard screen. It still functions, but I can't use the screen any longer. Two, it does not come with a handbook, which slows you down as you learn about it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bass

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how well this camera works!! Very clear ,and simple. The downside I would say is that it has very minimal instructions, and you have to play around and figure it out yourself, and the plus side is that it has night vision which works fantastic! I would recommend to security officers or anyone in law enforcement on a budget!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Could never get all of the settings to work. Could never get seller to return a phone call. IR was terrible. RETURNED ITEM before I got stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice body camera
customer_reviews.text: So far really liking this body camera easy to set up and use recording quality is sharp and clear. the only thing I dislike is putting the body camera in the charger it doesn't clip in and just kind of sits in there.
customer_reviews.author: Gage Nist

customer_reviews.title: Deserves five start
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing and very clear. Too bad don't have remote control..
customer_reviews.author: Sandra and Fez

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: After using this body cam on a K9 Deployment the device performed as described. Picture and audio quality was surprisingly good. Battery life was also acceptable. For the price point it's a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: First camera I received defective. Replacement works well.
customer_reviews.text: First unit I received had either defective USB cable or defective USB port. Vendor replaced unit immediately. Satisfied with performance of replacement camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Curran

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to operate! The photo feature is excellent! Was even charged when I got it and it took me just a minute to read the manual and I was recording immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dane

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: instructions are very minimal, couldn't get the thing to record properly, another piece of electronic equipment in the drawer
customer_reviews.author: john davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: great little unit. Wish it were smaller and less conspicuous but it certainly does the job.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Baize III

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Good for all around work Video clear will record over old if full
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Very effective product
customer_reviews.text: My husband works as a Level III Security Guard and he is very pleased with this product. It has great battery life and he is pleased with the quality of the videos/pictures.
customer_reviews.author: L. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap, durable product, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product quite a bit, good sound and video recording quality, multiple lengths of recording and varying degrees of clarity are nice to be able to adjust for the different shifts I work, in the different environments, the night vision is good quality also. It's an overall good buy, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Turner

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with this camera for the price. Does really good video and audio day or night.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would get 5 stars, but instructions are minimal. Also, I couldn't find a website for support.
customer_reviews.author: TMK

customer_reviews.title: Bodycam not charging fully
customer_reviews.text: Im having issues with my body cam that i got back in december 2017 since day 1
customer_reviews.author: Martha Cano

customer_reviews.title: Definitely keep on charger until going on shift.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue Ive had is kind of minor. The sensor for the auto infrared is a little touchy. In a well lit room, the ingrared may kick on regardless. Which is fine for recording purposes. However it drains the battery much faster. Still well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a security company and I bought this product in order to document any communications while the guard is conducting foot patrols. The camera does everything advertised. Battery life is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: Solid and excellent camera. Exceeds my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered as expected. Solid and excellent camera. Exceeds my expectations. Great customer service. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Warya

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and clear.
customer_reviews.text: So easy a marine could use it and durable enough that someone could drop it from shoulder level and it survives. I gave battery life a 4 because on full settings it doesnt make it through a 12 hr shift, though on lesser settings I feel like it would. Goes though 8 hr shifts on full settings no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Clear video
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Clear video. Sound a little low, but very audible if you hook up an external speaker while you're watching the video
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very fast delivery, very delicate custom.
customer_reviews.text: it was very fast shipping. the product took 4 days to come to Korea. and very satisfactory specification. the initial button sound is very large, but you can turn it off or off very small in the menu.
customer_reviews.author: hong suk jee

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit for LEO or Security
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for working Loss Prevention and Armed Security and love it. Has covered my six numerous times when suspects report false allegations to law enforcement and I can instantly replay the video on the small screen (can hook-up to laptop or PC if needed) and dispel any false information. Camera is easy to function, records good quality video. My only con would be that the camera unit records my audio great, but sometimes has a hard time hearing what the suspect(s) said or their audio is so weak it is sometimes unable to be discerned. Still photos also work great for documenting reports or printing photos later to support trespass warnings, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Pete H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for a bodycam functions are amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Victor valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Familiarize yourself with the buttons so you may activate instantly.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Camera as Security at a Casino I have all my Dangerous Encounters with Violent Criminals on Video for local Law Enforcement to View .
customer_reviews.author: Doug Van Gorder

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: kept the exwife sane when picking up my kids after divorce
customer_reviews.author: Kerry E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cam
customer_reviews.text: Great all around cam...volume is great and picture quality is perfect...just need extra attachments...I would rather have it centered on my uniform and something to make it sturdy during a foot chase. It would also be great if it had a better stabilizer...but all in all great cam
customer_reviews.author: denise swinney

customer_reviews.title: This product exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. It's easy to charge and retrieve video and audio recordings.
customer_reviews.author: Goddess Zena I. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, manual needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is actually pretty simple to use. Very clear picture and audio. The manual is vague and could use clarification and additional information. Fortunately, my wife is camera smart and figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: tufluk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing works really good
customer_reviews.text: Amazing works really good!! Wish they had a key fob for it! Would make things a lot more easier but Other then that thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: GOOD CAMERA WITH IT HAD INSTRUCTION BUT I FIGURED IT OUT
customer_reviews.author: DAVID J COOPER

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived fast and was packaged well. I was surprised by the overall quality of the device. I am a private investigator and also use it for conducting home inspections and process serving.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with product due to the constant failing too record
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with product due to the constant failing too record, failing to play back,and know one to complain too. Not a way to do business.
customer_reviews.author: George Cain

customer_reviews.title: Box & R-Tech
customer_reviews.text: Easily interfaces with my Box account to store videos and metadata.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Device failed after just one month of normal use. 1st the sound quit working. 2. Files wouldn't transfer from body cam to a PC or Mac. This was a terrible purchase from the start. I didn't receive all the accessories in the box, just the body cam. I worked around this problem. But now this thing is junk just doesn't work. Do not depend on this thing your safety, it will fail.
customer_reviews.author: Desert prince of the Oasis

customer_reviews.title: Could not reset date and time. Off by 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not reset date and time. Off by 1 date and 1 hour. Also could not exit menu mode while setting correct time and date and couldn't save settings.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bailey

customer_reviews.title: It needs instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it works great and shoots some excellent video, However it did not come with any instructions, there are a number of functions that you cannot use sue to the lack of instructions. You are also unable to change the date and time stamp.
customer_reviews.author: Swayback Camps and Outfitters

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recharging creates a burned circuit smell. I doubt it will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: SwordmanJr

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Will not power on even though it looks like it's charging, can I get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful device
customer_reviews.text: solid unit, heavy but sturdy. Instruction booklet poor, but you can flounder around & figure out most of it. MS-Dos, so Mac photo is invoked but shows no files. However mounts to desktop & you can retrieve files. You can also change the time stamp in the menu settings page. A remote FOB would be nice. The IR & the laser buttons do double duty as up/down buttons when your navigating the menu settings in case you didn't notice the little arrows. A useful device.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Brodzik

customer_reviews.title: Lucky to even get one star. Once turned on ...
customer_reviews.text: Lucky to even get one star. Once turned on the unit says the memory is full. There are no videos, photos or recordings on the unit. Plugged the unit into the computer, Properties says it is full but no memory size. Can't format it either. This POS is bbeig sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Mack Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back once already because the noise it made when recording and got a new one. Sending it back second time now and get a refund, now because when I'm recording it turn itself off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: audio isn't the best quality. Battery life is good
customer_reviews.text: Video is ok, audio isn't the best quality. Battery life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Zajic

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work form the beginning
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this because it just didn't work at all, the memory card kept saying that it was full as soon as a press the recording boton, I definitely don't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Paula Marte

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a wonderful IR camera. It may be, but for me, it is impossible to retrieve the captures. It does not seem to connect to a computer, however, there were NO instructions, so I don't know. Sometime around the fifth time I tried to use this camera, it made picture, but there doesn't seem to be a way to retrieve the information. I am highly disappointed with the functionality of this device, which might be rectified if there were the merest hint of instructions. As it is, I have no use for it, the pictures look great when taking them, but they stay on the unit -- so what?
customer_reviews.author: Cherie White

product_meta.title: R-Tech HD 1080P+ Up to 1296P(2034 x 1296) Infrared Night Vision Police Body Camera Body Worn Camera Security IR Cam with 32GB Built-in Memory Support Video/Audio Recording
product_meta.description:
Police Style Body Camera 
With 32GB of built-in storage (non-expandable), this high-definition body-mounted video recorder is made in mind with the needs of law enforcement. It provides a clear HD 1296P image, and the storage allows for hours of footage. The camera mounts via a rotating alligator-style clip, and also includes an alternate clip and docking station (which can also be used as a dash mount). A 2.0” LCD allows for a live preview of recorded footage as well as the ability to check recorded media. Best of all, recording can start at the touch of a single button. 

140° Wide Angle Lens 
The wide angle lens allows for a clear, wide picture – so it doesn’t miss any vital footage. 

Long Battery Life 
On a single charge, you can record for up to 10 hours (at 480P / no IR); it also comes with both a wall charger and a car charger. 

Infrared LEDs 
Dual high-intensity infrared LEDs can help capture clear footage up to 30 feet away in pitch-black darkness. 


Other Features / Accessories:  * White Visible Light LED
 * Red Laser Pointer
 * Audio-Only Recording Mode
 * Picture Mode – up to 32MP Resolution
 * AV / HDMI Out
 * IP65 Rating with Rugged Housing (drop-resistant to 10ft)


Specifications:  * Video Resolution: 2304x1296 (1296p), 1920x1080 (1080p), 1440x1080, 1280x720 (720p), 848x480 (480p), 720x480
 * Video Framerate: 60 FPS (720P / 480P), 30 FPS (all resolutions)
 * Photo: up to 7600x4275 (JPEG)
 * Battery Capacity: 2900mAh
 * Full Charge Time: 3 hours
 * Standby Time: 10 hours
 * Continuous Recording Time: 8 hours


All products sold by PoE Depot come with a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee – we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee, as well as a 1 year warranty that covers replacement for free.
feature_bullets: Rugged Police-Style Body Camera with 32GB Built-in Storage | Long Battery Life – Up to 10 Hours of Recording!
Full 1296P@30FPS Recording | 140° Wide Angle Lens – Record Every Detail!
Dual High Intensity Infrared LEDs – See up to 30 Feet in Pitch-Black Darkness!
Includes Two Clips, Desk / Car Dock, and USB Cable and Chargers
100% Satisfaction Guarantee – 30-day Money-Back Guarantee with 1 Year Warranty
